$ZIM its like watching people discuss the price of canadian oil in 2017.
World price was  $40 and Canadian bitumen hits a record discount selling for $11 barrel. .

Analysts are calculating that the cost of extraction of bitumen is $5 barrel therefore cenovus is "still good" even if prices drop to $6 then the stock is fairly valued if oil stays at $6 barrel forever.
3 months later it's back up to $30 with world price of $40 thanks to Canada's production cap.
And now the industry is screaming of shortages again.

body: Alphaliner released its overview of 2022 fleet changes on Tuesday. Together with Alphaliner‚Äôs historical records
